description: This source file defines utility functions for error checking, state waiting, and service management in a shell scripting environment, specifically for handling service states and errors in Utopia-based systems.

methods.name: check_err
methods.description: Checks a return code; if non-zero, logs error and updates service status and errinfo.

methods.name: check_err_exit
methods.description: Checks a return code; if non-zero, logs error, updates service status and errinfo, then exits.

methods.name: wait_till_end_state
methods.description: Waits until a service is out of starting or stopping state.

methods.name: wait_till_state
methods.description: Waits until a service reaches a specific state.
